title: Keep DC'ing
body: I keep disconecting from my game with ping spikes of 1000- 12000, then i restart my client and reconnect, and my ping is back to normal, but due to this problem I am now on level 1 leavebuster system, several of my friends are having similar problems. I am starting to wonder whether it is worth the effort of going through the system and trying to play to then be destroyed by your servers, any suggestions on what to do

replies.body: Who's your ISP and what OS are you on? When you start to get this high ping, do you lose any of your frame-rate?
yeah this cant be the reason you are on level1 leaver... if you have a dc game then stop playing until it is fixed, your fault.

Not entirely. If you don't know what's causing it, then how are you meant to fix it, or even know if your connection is working fine? As he said, most of the time his ping is fine; it's only sometimes it jumps, causing him to have to reconnect.

What I'm saying is don't be so harsh.
